about_the_game:
Echoes of Mystralia is a roguelite action-RPG that puts all the power in your hands. You create your spells. You refine your tactics. You carve your own path.

Play as Mazarim, a protector of the Cycle of Memories, and return to the magical world of Mystralia. Meet its inhabitants and confront the Shadows of the Past that haunt it. The Memory of the World will guide you in your fight against the threats of Oblivion.

CRAFT YOUR PLAYSTYLE

Experience a new era with the evolution of Mages of Mystralia’s award-winning spellcrafting system. Discover the intricate art of weaving memory magic and craft spells of infinite variety and powerful synergies.

Hone your tactics, level up your powers, and craft effective spells in order to face fearsome bosses and creatures. Each step of your journey will bring you closer to total mastery of magic. Be ready for epic battles that will decide the fate of Mystralia’s Memory.

CHOOSE YOUR PATH

Oblivion spreads its menace throughout Mystralia. On its roads. In its villages. Around its lakes and in the heart of its mountains. The journey to save the Memory of the World promises to be epic, full of pitfalls and encounters. Which path will you take, the easiest or the most rewarding?

DISCOVER YOUR INNER MAGIC 

Each memory found is a step towards balance and enlightenment. Seize your magical destiny and go explore this mystical world in this thrilling action and adventure game. Each encounter with the inhabitants and every battle against the Shadows of the Past strengthens your connection with the deep roots of this spellbinding kingdom.

As you explore mysterious lands and face challenges, you’ll collect memories that will shed light on the links between your own story and Mystralia's destiny.

SAVE MYSTRALIA'S MEMORY

Villagers and townspeople need your help to recover their memories. Complete quests to unravel secrets and earn rewards. The world map evolves with your adventures to support persistent story arcs.

JOIN OUR COMMUNITY, IMPACT THE GAME DEVELOPMENT

We invite you to join our community HUB on Discord to follow game development: be part of our private playtests, engage with other players and enter the magical world of Mystralia!
